game.name: Sky Knight
game.description:
This time you have entered the sky world where you have to face off different enemy planes and spaceships! Do you think that you can control the hostile bullets perfectly? Join Sky Knight game and get ready to fly your plane across an exclusively dangerous place! Your responsibility would be very big as many deadly enemies have attacked the earth and you have taken the charge of stopping them from doing so. Give it to try to experience new fun in this cool adventure challenge!
Your objective is to shoot down all your enemy planes and survive as long as you can. Be prepared to put your piloting abilities to test to sail through all the hurdles that you see coming from the top of the screen! Try to destroy as many planes as possible in this cool strategy shooter game! Your every successful shooting will reward you with some gold coins and points. So, keep grabbing more coins to unlock new aeroplanes in this airplane shooting game. 
Be careful and try to set your huge score without losing all your lives! You need to be careful as the enemy spaceships would not give you enough time. Kill all your enemy planes and spaceships as fast as you can and weave your way between the hostile bullets in this one of the best war games for kids! All the best to cruise around with your jet and explore the sky world like never before! Have fun online without download in our plane shooter game!
